StartBone: Name of root bone from which the spline extends *
EndBone: Name of bone at the end of the spline chain. Bones after this will not be altered by the controller.
BoneAxis: Axis of the controlled bone (ie the direction of the spline) to use as the direction for the curve.
bAutoCalculateSpline: The number of points in the spline if we are specifying it directly
PointCount: The number of points in the spline if we are not auto-calculating
Roll: Overall roll of the spline, applied on top of other rotations along the direction of the spline
TwistStart: The twist of the start bone. Twist is interpolated along the spline according to Twist Blend.
TwistEnd: The twist of the end bone. Twist is interpolated along the spline according to Twist Blend.
TwistBlend: How to interpolate twist along the length of the spline
Stretch:
The maximum stretch allowed when fitting bones to the spline. 0.0 means bones do not stretch their length,
1.0 means bones stretch to the length of the spline
Offset: The distance along the spline from the start from which bones are constrained
LODThreshold:
* Max LOD that this node is allowed to run
* For example if you have LODThreshold to be 2, it will run until LOD 2 (based on 0 index)
* when the component LOD becomes 3, it will stop update/evaluate
* currently transition would be issue and that has to be re-visited
Alpha: Current strength of the skeletal control
